channel.title: Home on OpenForecast
channel.description: Recent content in Home on OpenForecast

item.title: About the website
item.description: Hi all, This website is created in order to provide support for some R packages, related to forecasting. It is maintained by Ivan Svetunkov.

item.title: Papers
item.description: This page contains the links to the papers relevant to R packages mentioned on the website. Svetunkov Ivan, 2023. Smooth forecasting with the smooth package in R. www.openforecast.org. Svetunkov Ivan, Kourentzes Nikolaos, Ord J. Keith (2022). Complex Exponential Smoothing. Naval Research Logistics. 31. 10.1002/nav.22074
